errors.description: Referenced person IDs for managers in tickets do not match valid person IDs.
errors.suggested_remediation: Verify that all manager IDs referenced in the tickets are valid person IDs from the team member list.

errors.description: None of the tickets met the requirement for 'Done' status having code review comments.
errors.suggested_remediation: Add at least one code review comment to each 'Done' status ticket.

errors.description: No emails generated, hence, no compliance with ticket mention rules.
errors.suggested_remediation: Create appropriate email messages that adhere to the ticket mention rules.

errors.description: No emails present, hence cannot validate 'Business Hours Realism' or 'Spam Limits'.
errors.suggested_remediation: Ensure a realistic volume of emails is generated for appropriate validation.

warnings.description: Lack of email messages results in missing data consistency checks.
warnings.suggested_remediation: Include mails in the dataset to allow for comprehensive data quality checks.

warnings.description: Ticket count and person count generated match configured ranges, but no other metrics can be validated.
warnings.suggested_remediation: Add more tickets and emails while ensuring proper volume distribution.
